cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each service instance.

mem.description: Memory to allocate to each service instance.

placement.description: Constraints control where apps run to allow optimizing for either fault tolerance (by spreading a task out on multiple nodes) or locality (by running all of an applications tasks on the same node).

constraints.description: Constraints have three parts: a field name, an operator, and an optional parameter. The field can be the hostname of the agent node or any attribute of the agent node. Example: [["rack_id", "LIKE", "rack-foo-.*"], ["rack_id", "MAX_PER", "2"]]

mem.description: Memory to allocate to each notebook instance.

docker_image.description: The docker image to be used for the users' notebook.

networking.description: Networking-related configuration properties for JupyterHub on DC/OS.

virtual_host.description: The virtual host address to configure for integration with Marathon-lb.

ssl_cert.description: The path to the SSL certificate for the domain.

admin_users.description: List of admin users, separated by a comma.

whitelisted_users.description: List of whitelisted users, seperated by a comma.

api_tokens.description: List of API tokens, seperated by a comma e.g. token1:user1,token2:user2
